sentences.english: Now lift up your weight and put the second section on top.
sentences.chinese: 拿开你的重物，放上第二页纸。

sentences.english: The doctor warned her that her uterus might rupture if she lifted something heavy.
sentences.chinese: 医生警告她不要提重物，避免子宫破裂。

sentences.english: Each person has a mat with weights and bands.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都备有一个垫子，并配有重物和腕带。

sentences.english: Weights are likely to slide down the rear when they stay on the tail board.
sentences.chinese: 重物放在尾板上时，有向后方滑下的可能。

sentences.english: I would like to check me valuables。
sentences.chinese: 请将我的贵重物品寄存。

sentences.english: Nearly every day, there are reports to the security office on campus that valuable things are stolen away.
sentences.chinese: 几乎每天校园里都有向保安处报告说贵重物品被偷。

sentences.english: Press with weight or use racket jacket on newly glued blade for a few minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用重物压或扣上拍夹数分钟使胶皮黏牢。

sentences.english: Breakables or heavy objects that are kept on high or open shelves.
sentences.chinese: 放置在开放架或高处的易碎品或重物可能坠落。

sentences.english: They can carry a vast weight but are very heavy.
sentences.chinese: 它们身体很重，也能携带巨大的重物。

sentences.english: Yes , I have . Can Ideposit valuables here ?
sentences.chinese: 有，我可以将贵重物品寄存在这里吗？

sentences.english: So we remove the stops, and the piston moves up, and now we remove one of these weights.
sentences.chinese: 我们移走挡板，活塞向上移动，移走一个重物。

sentences.english: Ability to grasp , lift and carry or otherwise move packages , boxes and luggage up to 100lbs . continuously throughout shift .
sentences.chinese: 有一定负重能力，能在当值期间持续搬运行李和重物。

sentences.english: Having been warned about the bandits, she left her valuables at home.
sentences.chinese: 有人警告她有盗匪，她把贵重物品都留在家里。

sentences.english: I keep all my valuables under lock and key.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的一切贵重物品妥为保藏。

definition: (lit. and fig.) to carry a heavy load/to carry a heavy burden
to sustain/to bear the weight (of the upper storeys in architecture)/load-bearing
to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
